Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.Shop

  • public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
    Hold information about current prices and inventories.

      • gamblingProfit

        public static int gamblingProfit(int round,
                                 int timeLeft)
        Randomly generate an amount of money earned gambling on the given round with the given time left. The value is the base gambling profit plus a random percentage of the amount of time left. Also see Gambling at the Pub.
        Parameters:
        round - round to compute gambling profit on
        timeLeft - time left in the given turn
        Returns:
        amount of money earned gambling

      • buy

        public boolean buy(Player player,
                   ResourceType resource)
        Buy a single unit of the given resource from the given player to this shop. Buying fails if the shop doesn't have any of the given resource, or the player doesn't have enough money.
        Parameters:
        player - player who is buying
        resource - resource being bought
        Returns:
        whether the resource was successfully sold

      • sell

        public boolean sell(Player player,
                    ResourceType resource)
        Sell a single unit of the given resource to the given player from this shop. Selling fails if the given player doesn't have any of the given resource.
        Parameters:
        player - player who is selling
        resource - resource being sold
        Returns:
        whether the resource was successfully sold

      • sellMule

        public boolean sellMule(Player player,
                        MuleType muleType)
        Sell a MULE of the given type to the given player. Selling fails if the player is already carrying a MULE, or there are no mules in the shop.
        Parameters:
        player - player to buy MULE for
        Returns:
        whether a MULE was successfully bought
